|c|☆The power of ROCK|Welcome to the ROCK gym
|c|☆How To Beat Lance|"I've been waiting for you. Power of Rock! I knew that you, with your skills, would eventually reach me here. There's no need for words now. We will battle to determine who is the stronger of the two of us. As the most powerful trainer and as the Pokémon League Champion… I, Lance the dragon master, accept your challenge!
